title: shrI guruguha tArayashu
sahitya:
shrI guruguha tArayAshu mam (sharavaNabhava) surapati shrIpati ratipati vAkpati kSitipati pashupati sEvita


caraNam   rAgAdi rahita hrdaya vibhAvita suramuni pUjita tyAgAdhirAja kumAra tApatraya hara kumAra 
bhOgirAja vinuta pAda bhUdEva kriyAmOda yOgi rAjayOga bhEda yukta manOllaya vinOda
